entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 early this afternoon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 09:02 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 09:02 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 11. POP 60%
